description: Numerators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(635).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,252,0,-1).
formula: G.f.: (25 +126*x +25*x^2 -x^3)/(x^4 -252*x^2 +1). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 19 2013a(n) = 252*a(n-2) - a(n-4). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 19 2013
mathematica: Numerator[Convergents[Sqrt[635], 30]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Dec 15 2012 *)CoefficientList[Series[(25 + 126 x + 25 x^2 - x^3)/(x^4 - 252 x^2 + 1), {x, 0, 30}], x](* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 19 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[25,126,6325,31751]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 252*Self(n-2)-Self(n-4): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 19 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
